column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A Chinese man driving a RAV4 hit a bus
column4: which then overturned at------ 7:15 am on November 3
column12: was driven by a Chinese man named LIU RENJUN
column14: fromPhnom Penh to Sihanoukville when the accident occurred.------The car swerved across the road and hit------ a 25-seat Hyundai bus
column16: a 26-year-old resident of ------ Kampong Cham province
column17: which overturned.------ ------The above case does not cause any injuries
column18: and the competent authority intervened for both parties to agree on a legal settlement.------DAP
